entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
